DOC.brief_summary: In current study aim determine early glucose screen treatment among woman high risk GDM improve perinatal outcome decrease gestational weight gain . Half participant assign early glucose screen group ( 12-18 week ) treatment necessary half standard 24-28 week glucose screen .
DOC.criteria: Pregnant subject 1845 y/o Any following : Obesity define BMI > 30 kg/m2 History pregnancy complicate GDM History pregnancy complicate macrosomia First degree relative diabetes Multiple gestation Incomplete Data : data miss ( i.e Delivery data ) , analysis complete . Pregnancy complicate fetal malformation aneuploidy : It affect prenatal care , mode delivery well perinatal outcome . Pregestational Overt Diabetes : Patients Diabetes diagnosed GDM . Chronic medical condition hypertension , renal disease , autoimmune condition : Those condition may affect prenatal care , perinatal morbidity . Early diabetes screen perform prior enrollment study : Participant randomize , probably treat . Medical contraindication glucose tolerance test ( bariatric surgery ) : patient h/o gastric bypass frequently tolerate oral glucose load , therefore screen GDM traditional way .
